title: Cumbria Institute of the Arts
content:
Hi,

I’m considering applying to Cumbria Institute of the Arts as an exchange student next year. Thought I’d check and see if anyone is here is familiar with the school. If so do you have anything good or bad to say about it?

I’m applying to the Art and Design programme.

[http://www.ciota.ac.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080119231954/http:/www.ciota.ac.uk/ "http://www.ciota.ac.uk/")

peter

author: kattttor
